verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of David, when Doeg the Edomite came and told) (Saul, and said to him, "David has come to the house of Ahimelech. <WH288>") Why <WH4100> do you boast <WH1984> in evil, <WH9567> O mighty <WH1368> man <WH1368>? The lovingkindness <WH2617> of God <WH410> [endures] all <WH3605> day <WH3117> long.
Your tongue <WH3956> devises <WH2803> destruction, <WH1942> Like a sharp <WH3913> razor, <WH8593> O worker <WH6213> of deceit. <WH7423>
You love <WH157> evil <WH9563> more <WH4480> than <WH4480> good, <WH9185> Falsehood <WH8267> more <WH4480> than <WH4480> speaking <WH1696> what <WH6664> is right. <WH6664> Selah. <WH5542>
You love <WH157> all <WH3605> words <WH1697> that devour, <WH1105> O deceitful <WH4820> tongue. <WH3956>

But God <WH410> will break <WH5422> you down <WH5422> forever; <WH5331> He will snatch <WH2846> you up, and tear <WH5255> you away <WH5255> from [your] tent, <WH168> And uproot <WH8327> you from the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416> Selah. <WH5542>
And the righteous <WH6662> will see <WH7200> and fear, <WH3372> And will laugh <WH7832> at him, [saying,]

"Behold, <WH2009> the man <WH1397> who would not make <WH7760> God <WH430> his refuge, <WH4581> But trusted <WH982> in the abundance <WH7230> of his riches, <WH6239> [And] was strong <WH5810> in his [evil] desire. <WH1942>"

But as for me, I am like a green <WH7488> olive <WH2132> tree <WH2132> in the house <WH1004> of God; <WH430> I trust <WH982> in the lovingkindness <WH2617> of God <WH430> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>

I will give <WH3034> Thee thanks <WH3034> forever, <WH5769> because <WH3588> Thou hast done <WH6213> [it], And I will wait <WH6960> on Thy name, <WH8034> for [it is] good, <WH2896> in the presence <WH5048> of Thy godly <WH2623> ones. <WH2623>
